# How to order? | Wydawnictwo AGH

URL: https://www.wydawnictwo.agh.edu.pl/en/strona/583-how-order
Crawled: 2025-03-19 21:25:43

How to order?

Foreign order

Our publications can be purchased in the following ways:

    by e-mail: 
wydawnictwa@agh.edu.pl

    by mail: AGH University of Science and Technology, AGH University Press, 30-059 Kraków, al. Mickiewicza 30

Please provide us with pertinent information :

    your name and address

    your e-mail address

    shipping address

    title of the book, author's name, number of copies ordered

The payment should be made on the AGH University Press account number (in Euro): IBAN PL 49 1240 4722 1978 0000 4859 8327 SWIFT/BIC: PKOPPLPW. As the transfer title, please state your name. For further information please see: 
Payment and Shipment

We ship worldwide by Polish Post. In order to see shipment prices please contact us: 
wydawnictwa@agh.edu.pl
 The cost depends on which country we will be shipping your purchase order.

In case of any further questions do not hestitate to contact us on: 
wydawnictwa@agh.edu.pl

Foreign-language customers in Poland

Our publications can be purchased in the following ways:

online store

e-mail: wydawnictwa@agh.edu.pl

in person at the headquarters of AGH University Press at 17 Reymonta St.

by mail: AGH University Press, al. Mickiewicza 30, 30-059 Krakow

In the body of the order, please specify:

name and address of the ordering person or company, telephone number, e-mail address

title of the book, author's name, number of ordered copies

When ordering as an institution, please write your taxpayer identification number (NIP) and the note, "We authorize the AGH University Press to issue a VAT invoice without our signature."

Payment should be made to the account number of AGH Publishers: 69 1240 2294 1111 0010 7836 2948 Bank Pekao S.A. Krakow Branch. In the body of the transfer, please specify the order number and/or your name.

When purchasing directly at the AGH University Press' office, you can only pay by card or BLIK.

Depending on the method of delivery chosen, shipping costs should be added to the book's price. To check shipping costs and methods, please see 
Payment and Shipment
.

It is possible to pick up the order directly at the headquarters of AGH University Press.

For orders over PLN 200, shipping costs are borne by AGH University Press.
